sub_title: Image Processing Engineer/Tuner | Bosch Security Systems B.V.
summary:
Dual citizenship: Portugal and Brazil. BSc, MSc and PhD Unicamp expertise: image/video compression standards, subjective and objective visual image quality , image quality procedures, digital image processing, artifacts reduction, motion estimation, DCT and wavelets, Entropy coding, Channel coding, Fractal and Iris compression; Technologies developer in C/C++and VHDL 
  Coordination skills. Several technologies patented.
  Entrepreneur (opened a small company to develop his own technologies and patents), also acting as a consultant in R&D for development of new technologies and enhancements of already existent technologies in his expertise field.

profile_positions.description: Entrepreneur (opened a small company to develop his own technologies and patents). Research and development for new technologies in signal, image and video processing. The project involved implementation in C/C++ and VHDL for Altera's FPGA of several signal processing techniques (Fourier and Wavelet Transforms, Entropy coding, Motion Estimation, among others).
